name: App Builders Bootcamp (Teens Edition)
location: The Code School, Bahria Town Phase 4, Rawalpindi
description: A 5-day immersive tech camp where teens learn to design and build their own mobile apps from scratch. The course covers UI/UX principles, basic programming in Flutter, and app publishing essentials. Hands-on challenges and peer-to-peer sessions foster collaboration and innovation.Ideal for teens aged 13–17, with no prior coding experience required.

name: Garden Art & Clay Day for Kids
description: Let your kids explore their creative side in this outdoor art session combining clay modeling with nature crafts. Children will make fun garden ornaments using leaves, pebbles, twigs, and air-dry clay. The event includes storytelling, music, and a healthy snack break in a safe, shaded area. Suitable for kids aged 6–12. All materials are non-toxic and included.

name: Little Scientists Day
location: Rawalpindi Science Center, Saidpur Road, Rawalpindi
description: A fun-packed day where curious young minds explore the wonders of science through interactive exhibits and mini-experiments.Kids aged 5–12 will get to build simple machines, make slime, launch mini rockets, and more!.Parents are welcome to join or enjoy refreshments in the lounge while kids explore.Includes take-home science kits and certificates of participation.

name: Clay & Create: Pottery Workshop
location: The Artisan’s Corner, F-6 Markaz, Islamabad
description: Discover the joy of working with clay in this hands-on workshop designed for both beginners and art enthusiasts. Participants will learn basic hand-building techniques and create their own pottery piece to take home.All materials are provided, and guidance will be given by professional local ceramic artists.A perfect creative escape for a relaxing weekend!

name: CodeStorm Hackathon 2025
location: National Incubation Center, Sector H-9, Islamabad
description: Join the region’s most exciting hackathon where tech minds gather to build innovative solutions in just 48 hours. Whether you're a developer, designer, or idea machine, this event is your chance to network, learn, and create. Cash prizes, mentorship from top industry experts, and hands-on coding challenges await. Meals and workspace provided for all participants.
